ai.summary: A short, easy loop of about 1.2 km starting and ending at Kingston station in the UK. This family-friendly route blends riverside scenery with a stroll through Kingston town center and returns to the station in under an hour.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily paved paths and sidewalks with a few short grassy sections. Mostly flat with gentle ramps where the route follows the riverside; curb transitions are common and surfaces are generally smooth.
ai.safety_notes: Stay aware of pedestrians and cyclists on shared paths. Cross streets at designated crossings. Be cautious of slippery surfaces near the river when wet. If walking after dusk, carry a light and wear visible clothing; secure belongings and watch for crowds around Kingston town center.
recommended_gear: Light jacket or layer for changing weather
Phone with maps or offline navigation
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; suitable year-round with appropriate clothing

seo.meta_description: Explore a short, easy 1.2 km loop starting and ending at Kingston Station in the UK. Ideal for families, flat paths, riverside views, and a quick city stroll.
